query:
SELECT
                COUNT(c.id)
            FROM
                conversations c
            JOIN LATERAL (
                SELECT
                    cm.created_at,
                    cm.created_by_id
                FROM
                    conversation_messages cm
                WHERE
                    cm.conversation_id = c.id
                ORDER BY
                    cm.created_at DESC
                LIMIT 1
            ) AS lm ON TRUE
            WHERE
                lm.created_by_id != $1
                AND
                (
                    (c.sender_id = $1 AND (c.sender_last_seen_at < lm.created_at))
                    OR
                    (c.receiver_id = $1 AND (c.receiver_last_seen_at IS NULL OR c.receiver_last_seen_at < lm.created_at))
                );
